home.title: Welcome to the Class Schedule Website!
home.subtitle: We are extremely excited for you to come and use our services. This website is designed to help you manage and organize your study time easily and effectively. Regardless of whether you are a student, teacher, or classroom manager, we hope that this website will meet and serve your needs.
